message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a price of $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. I believe this is a fair offer considering the product's value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $875000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $887500. This is my final compromise on the price. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $880000 for the product.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $892500. This is my final compromise on the price. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $885000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already compromised a lot on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and offer $890000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $887500 for the product.
